sentences.en: Dick Diver is the epitome of this world.
sentences.cn: 迪克·戴弗是这个世界的写照.

sentences.en: He is a deep sea diver.
He learnt his trade as a diver in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 他在北海学会了潜水员这一行的本事。

sentences.en: I asked to get buddied up with an experienced diver.
sentences.cn: 我要求和有经验的潜水员搭档.

sentences.en: Police divers have recovered the body of a sixteen year old boy.
sentences.cn: 警方潜水员已经发现了一个16岁男孩的尸体。

sentences.en: The diver comes up for air.
sentences.cn: 潜水员升到水面呼吸空气.

sentences.en: The diver draws a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 这个潜水者深深地吸了口气.

sentences.en: The diver first drew a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 跳水员先深深地吸了一口气.

sentences.en: The diver flipped over backwards into the water.
The diver poised on the edge of the high board.
sentences.cn: 跳水者在高高的跳板边缘保持平衡.

sentences.en: The diver put wads of cotton in his ears.
sentences.cn: 潜水员以小块棉花塞在耳朵里.

sentences.en: The diver stayed down for some time.
sentences.cn: 潜水员在水下待了一些时候.

sentences.en: The diver went into the deep water beyond the danger limit.
sentences.cn: 潜水员下潜到超过危险线的深水中去了.

sentences.en: They geared the deep - sea diver with helmet, suit and air nose.
sentences.cn: 他们给 深海 潜水员配备了防护帽 、 潜水服和通气管.

sentences.en: Two divers work together while a standby diver remains on the surface.
sentences.cn: 两名潜水员协同工作,同时有一名候补潜水员留在水面上.

sentences.en: We squatted beside the pool and watched the diver sink slowly down.
sentences.cn: 我们蹲在水池旁，看着潜水者慢慢沉下水。

words.tran_cn: 潜水；跳水；俯冲；急剧下降
[水运]潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟

trans.tran_cn: 潜水员，跳水者，跳水运动员，潜鸟，〈俚〉潜水艇
trans.tran_en: someone who swims or works under water using special equipment to help them breathe
